dcterms:creator: P. Webster
dcterms:description: Images of ceramic pieces from Dragendorff forms Dr27, Dr33, Dr35, Dr37, and Dr38 used for training the core deep learning classifier.
dcterms:title: Dragendorff forms Dr27, Dr33, Dr35, Dr37, Dr38

dcterms:description: Synthetic dataset containing 80640 images of each form for training, 10080 images of each form for validation, and 10080 images of each form for testing.
dcterms:title: Synthetic dataset for pottery classification
